document_data.name: Infratorch
document_data.mainbody: '''''Infratorch''''' was an [[alteration]] [[spell]] that allowed the caster, along with anyone nearby, to see as if they possessed [[infravision]].
document_data.Effects: When this spell was cast, a [[mage]] imbued a piece a wood with magic that cause it to act as if it were a [[magic]]al [[torch]] that conferred infravision upon others. It did not radiate light or heat but did grant its beneficial effects to anyone within 15' (4.6 m).
document_data.Components: In addition to the [[verbal component]], this spell required a single piece of wood, such as a [[staff]], stick or even a snuffed-out torch.
